Constructor Detail

LotOps

public LotOps()
Method Detail

buildLotsGraph

public static void buildLotsGraph(Coordinate[] coords,
                                  Geometry voronoi,
                                  Graph g)
Populates the "lots" graph. This method should only be called during the initialization phase of the simulation as new lots are later inserted dynamically.

Parameters:
coords - An array of Coordinate corresponding to the positions of the seeds of each land lot.
voronoi - The Voronoi diagram based on the land lots seeds.
g - The graph to be populated.

placeLot

public static Node placeLot(double x,
                            double y,
                            Graph g)
Adds and positions a new node to the "lots" graph.

Parameters:
x - The position of the lot seed on the x-axis.
y - The position of the lot seed on the y-axis.
Returns:
The newly added node.

getLotCoordinates

public static Coordinate getLotCoordinates(Node lot,
                                           Graph g)
Gives the coordinates of a lot.

Parameters:
lot - The lot which position is queried.
g - The graph containing the aforementioned lot.
Returns:
A Coordinate representing the position of the lot seed.

getLotsCoordinates

public static Coordinate[] getLotsCoordinates(Graph g)
Gives the coordinates of every lots.

Parameters:
g - The graph containing the lots.
Returns:
An array of Coordinate containing the position of the lots seeds.

getLotAt

public static Node getLotAt(double x,
                            double y,
                            Graph g)
Gives the lot associated with the cell at the given position.

Parameters:
x - The x-axis coordinate of the queried position.
y - The y-axis coordinate of the queried position.
g - The graph containing the lots.
Returns:
The Node representing the corresponding lot or null if it does not exist.

bindLotToPolygon

public static boolean bindLotToPolygon(Node lot,
                                       Geometry voronoi)
Associate a lot with its corresponding Voronoi cell. The cell is then recorded in the Node as an attribute.

Parameters:
lot - The node to be associated with a cell.
voronoi - The Voronoi diagram containing candidate cells.
Returns:
true if the polygon is found, false otherwise.

getPolygonAt

public static Polygon getPolygonAt(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   Geometry voronoi)
Gives the Voronoi cell at a given position.

Parameters:
x - The x-axis position.
y - The y-axis position.
voronoi - The Voronoi diagram containing candidate cells.
Returns:
The cell as a Polygon.

clipLotsToCity

public static void clipLotsToCity(Graph g)
Clips every lots cells to the general shape of the city. This method is used to get rid of the large cells occupying the exterior edges of the Voronoi diagram.

Parameters:
g - The graph containing lots to be clipped.

clipLotToCity

public static void clipLotToCity(Node lot,
                                 Polygon cityHull,
                                 Graph g)
Clips a unique lot cell to the general shape of the city.

Parameters:
lot - The lot to be clipped.
cityHull - A Polygon representing the general shape of the city. The final cell will be the intersection between th city hull and the lot cell.
g - The graph containing every lots.

linkToNeighbors

public static void linkToNeighbors(Node lot,
                                   Graph g)
Adds edges between a lot and the adjacent ones. Two lots are considered neighbors if their cells are touching (i.e. if they share a Voronoi edge).

Parameters:
lot - The lot to be linked with its neighbors.
g - The graph containing the lot and the possible neighbors.

unlinkFromInvalidNeighbors

public static void unlinkFromInvalidNeighbors(Node lot,
                                              Graph g)
Removes edges between lots that are no longer adjacent. This method is typically called when the topology of the "lots" graph could have been compromised by an update (e.g. a lot insertion).

Parameters:
lot - The lot to be updated.
g - The graph containing the lot and its neighbors.

isLotNeighborWith

public static boolean isLotNeighborWith(Node lot,
                                        Node neighbor)

isLotNeighborWith

public static boolean isLotNeighborWith(Node lot,
                                        java.util.List<Node> neighbors)

getCellCoordinates

public static Coordinate[] getCellCoordinates(Node lot)

getCellPoints2D

public static java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D> getCellPoints2D(Node lot)

hasVertex

public static boolean hasVertex(Node lot,
                                Coordinate coord)
